scripts.u-all: npm run u-encore && npm run u-gulp && npm run u-snowpack && npm run u-vite && npm run u-webpack
scripts.i-all: npm run i-encore && npm run i-gulp && npm run i-snowpack && npm run i-vite && npm run i-webpack
scripts.b-all: npm run b-encore && npm run b-gulp && npm run b-snowpack && npm run b-vite && npm run b-webpack
scripts.l-all: npm run l-encore && npm run l-gulp && npm run l-snowpack && npm run l-vite && npm run l-webpack
scripts.u-encore: cd encore && npm unlink xtendui && npm run upgrade --latest && cd ..
scripts.i-encore: cd encore && npm install && npm unlink xtendui && npm install xtendui --save && cd ..
scripts.b-encore: cd encore && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.l-encore: cd encore && npm link xtendui && cd ..
scripts.u-gulp: cd gulp && npm unlink xtendui && npm run upgrade --latest && cd ..
scripts.i-gulp: cd gulp && npm install && npm unlink xtendui && npm install xtendui --save && cd ..
scripts.b-gulp: cd gulp && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.l-gulp: cd gulp && npm link xtendui && cd ..
scripts.u-snowpack: cd snowpack && npm unlink xtendui && npm run upgrade --latest && cd ..
scripts.i-snowpack: cd snowpack && npm install && npm unlink xtendui && npm install xtendui --save && cd ..
scripts.b-snowpack: cd snowpack && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.l-snowpack: cd snowpack && npm link xtendui && cd ..
scripts.u-vite: cd vite && npm unlink xtendui && npm run upgrade --latest && cd ..
scripts.i-vite: cd vite && npm install && npm unlink xtendui && npm install xtendui --save && cd ..
scripts.b-vite: cd vite && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.l-vite: cd vite && npm link xtendui && cd ..
scripts.u-webpack: cd webpack && npm unlink xtendui && npm run upgrade --latest && cd ..
scripts.i-webpack: cd webpack && npm install && npm unlink xtendui && npm install xtendui --save && cd ..
scripts.b-webpack: cd webpack && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.l-webpack: cd webpack && npm link xtendui && cd ..
